metrics.name: DatabaseConnections
metrics.documentation: The number of database connections in use.

metrics.name: FreeStorageSpace
metrics.documentation: The amount of available storage space.

metrics.name: FreeableMemory
metrics.documentation: The amount of available random access memory.

metrics.name: WriteIOPS
metrics.documentation: The average number of disk read I/O operations per second.

metrics.name: ReadIOPS
metrics.documentation: The average number of disk write I/O operations per second.
